name: Final Slash VR (POC)
description:
Swords & liberation locomotion. How combat should be in VR.

Fend off against enemies while exploring this strange land. This prototype showcases this new way of combat in a survival action setting. 

This is an early prototype I wanted to get out to the hands of the public. It's been almost 3 years since I've started this project. Let's see what you think 🙂

Many of the mechanics have taken a long time to implement, but the core game play has been pretty much cobbled together. Would love suggestions on what people would like to see what this may become.
